Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section and contains many small white inclusions, the interior is partially spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393788) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393788)
